release.action: Added BinaryCondition.escapeLikeLiteral method for correctly escaping literal strings in like patterns.
move basic dbspec implementation from SqlBuilderTest to basic pacakge; update documentation (add more package javadocs)
Add foreign key constraint action to AlterTableQuery.
Cleaned out some duplicate null checks.
Add accessors for the internal ComboConditions to facilitate common condition building code.
Cleanup some inconsistencies around Conditions and Expressions. Make most simple SqlObjects extend Expression. Ditch ValueExpression. Add CustomExpression.
Move some helper code out of SqlObject (code review feedback).
Make getSchemaObjects abstract (code review feedback). While this is a slight pain for most value objects, it makes code addition slightly safer as implementor is forced to deal with the method.
Added null check to QueryPreparer.toString() method
Added support for the "HAVING" clause that can be used in combination with the "GROUP BY" clause to SelectQuery.
fixed group by clauses in SelectQuery
Initial release as separate sqlbuilder project.
